'''Ferdinand Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. 

==History==
Ferdinand was the son of [[Sigismond Took]]. He was the father of [[Ferdibrand Took|Ferdibrand]]. They both attended [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo Baggins']] [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Farewell Party]] in {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>
==Etymology==
The name is composed of ''ferdi'' "peace" + ''nand'' "daring, brave".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
